suites.title: [Khrystyk] Search
suites.description: New feature “Search”. It allows users to search for posts and pages inside our blog.

cases.title: Verify if the color of the search button changes when hovering over the cursor
cases.preconditions: The user has logged in and any blog page is open

steps.action: Hover over the search button
steps.expected_result: The search button light up when hovering the mouse cursor ![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/8aeaf9815dc9d4eadb742bf67d239116f7921f5f/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-16%20120142.jpg)

cases.title: Verify whether the search bar should appear below the navigation bar
cases.preconditions: The user has logged in and any blog page is open

steps.action: Open any page
steps.expected_result:
On the main page, under the top navigation bar, there is a Search Bar, when it is empty, the field says "Search..."
![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/a3c606ff330acebadf9a22eaf283d95fdf9c6684/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-16%20121407.jpg)

cases.title: Verify the display of "Search..." in the Search Bar
cases.preconditions: The user has logged in and any blog page is open

steps.action: Verify that placeholder "Search..." displays in the Search bar
steps.expected_result:
Placeholder displays in Search bar
![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/b278b93d593239f2ee9a2e9d2de71f17ed12cbfc/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-24%20082920.jpg)

steps.action: Enter any characters in the search bar
steps.expected_result:
1. The entered text is displayed in the search bar.
2. The placeholder disappears after characters are entered

![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/5946b6d47dc1c38cdec028aef795ad3781c67b1b/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-24%20083154.jpg)

cases.title: Verify whether an empty search page opens by pressing the "Search"
cases.preconditions: The user has logged in and any blog page is open

steps.action: Open any blog page
steps.expected_result: The Search Bar is on the left side of the page

steps.action: Сlick the "Search" button
steps.expected_result: An empty search page will open, there are no results ![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/4822c8118e07560b2548ac23dc4372e1731445b9/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-24%20084353.jpg)

cases.title: [SPSB] Verify whether the search is blocked when invalid data is entered in the Search Page and Search Page
cases.preconditions: The user has logged in and any blog page is open

steps.action:
1. Enter one character on the Search Page
2. Click the search button.
steps.expected_result: The search button should be inactive, the message "Invalid data entered" appears because the data is not valid

steps.action:
1. Enter two characters on the search page
2. Click the search button.
steps.expected_result: The search button should be inactive, the message "Invalid data entered" appears because the data is not valid

steps.action:
1. Enter "Search query" consisting of 129 valid characters in the search field on the Search Bar.
2. Click the search button.
steps.expected_result: The search button should be inactive, the message "Invalid data entered" appears because the data is not valid
steps.data: e.g. "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatib"

cases.title: [SPSB] Verify the input of the "Search query" from valid data in the Search Bar and Search Page
cases.preconditions:
* The user has logged in and any blog page is open
* Рosts have been created, in which the Title, Description, and Body contain keywords that will be searched for. If there are none, you need to create one

steps.action:
1. Enter 3 characters in the "Search Query" field in the search bar. 
2. Click the search button.
steps.expected_result:
1. Search page displays with the title of this page contain the entry **"Search result for "** ***entered*** ***search query*"** 
2.  Section "Search results" displays the search result.

![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/b12a719fa8db8f772d2932807dfb7e43199619f4/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-16%20140905.jpg)

steps.action:
1. Change your search query to 4 valid characters in the search field. 
2. Click the search button.
steps.expected_result:
1. Search page displays with the title of this page contain the entry **"Search result for "** ***entered*** ***search query*"** 
2.  Section "Search results" displays the search result.

steps.action:
1. Change your search query to 128 valid characters in the search field. 
2. Click the search button.
steps.expected_result: A search page will open to the right of the main page. The title of this page has the entry **"Search Result for** **"*entered*** ***search query*"**. Under "Search results" the search result is displayed. The title has a blue color and you can go to the post or page after the message
steps.data: e.g. "Ma quande lingues coalesce, li grammatica del resultant lingue es plu simplic e regulari quam ti del coalescent lingues. Li nov"

cases.title: [SPSB] Verify pagination
cases.preconditions:
1. The user is logged in and any blog page is open
2. The required number of publications containing a search query, which will be checked, has been created. If not, you need to create one.

steps.action: Enter the data in the search field and click the Search button.
steps.expected_result: The Search Page opens with the search results.

steps.action: Count the number of search results displayed on the search page, if more than 10 the pagination panel should be displayed.
steps.expected_result: Shows the pagination bar because there are more than 10 search results.

steps.action: Go to the next page in the page pagination panel.
steps.expected_result: A second page opens with a different search result

steps.action: Enter the data in the search field and click the Search button.
steps.expected_result: The Search Page opens with the search results.

steps.action: Count the number of search results displayed on the search page, if less than 10, the pagination panel is missing
steps.expected_result: The Рagination panel is missing because less than 10 search results are displayed

cases.title: [SPSB] Verify whether there is a transition to the post from the search results
cases.preconditions:
1. The user is logged in and any blog page is open
2. Created posts with data that will be checked, if they are missing, you need to create them

steps.action:
1. Enter keywords in the search field
2. Сlick the Search button.
steps.expected_result: The Search Page opens with the search results.

steps.action:
Verify if search results consist of:

1. **Title**
2. **Description**
3. **Body**
steps.expected_result:
Search results should be displayed on the search page and consist of:

1. **Title**
2. **Description**
3. **Body**

![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/3b628bc11f9d982c7a74870615a72ffd44ee7984/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-24%20115619.jpg)

steps.action: Verify if the title of the found content is blue.
steps.expected_result: The title of the search results is blue

steps.action: Check if the title of the found content is highlighted on mouseover.
steps.expected_result: The title of the found content is highlighted on mouseover.

steps.action: Verify if the title of the found content is a link to the corresponding content
steps.expected_result: After clicking on any search result, there is a transition to the post

cases.title: [SPSB] Verify whether search results are displayed for keywords that are  in "Title", "Description" and "Slug"
cases.preconditions:
The user is authorized and any page of the blog is open
Pages and publications are created, in which the "Title", "Description" and "Slog" contain keywords that will be searched. If there are none, they need to be created

steps.action: Enter keywords in the search field and click the Search button.
steps.expected_result: The Search Page opens.

steps.action: Verify whether the search result consists of a title, description, main content and a fragment of found content
steps.expected_result: A search result consists of a title, description, body content, and a snippet of found content (example in the photo) ![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/5b5556617882caab66ffbbc0e4de5d1dd075b838/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-16%20140905.jpg)

steps.action: Verify if the title of the found content is blue.
steps.expected_result: The title of the found content is blue.

steps.action: Verify if the title of the found content is underlined when hovering over the mouse cursor.
steps.expected_result: The title of the found content is highlighted on mouseover.

steps.action: Verify if the title of the found content is a link to the corresponding content
steps.expected_result: The title of the found content is a link to the corresponding content, a transition to a page or post takes place

cases.title: Check the possibility of going to the Search Page using the link
cases.preconditions:
The user is authorized and any page of the blog is open
At least 1 page or post has been created, in which the "Title", "Description" and "Slug" contain keywords that will be searched. If there are none, they need to be created

steps.action: Enter a keyword in the search field
steps.expected_result: The Search Page opens with search results

steps.action: Copy the link in the address bar of the browser, paste the address in a new tab and press Enter
steps.expected_result: The Search Page opens on a new page of the browser, all information is displayed as on the previous one

cases.title: Verify how the search is performed when data is entered that are not in Search Page in the Title, Description, and Slug
cases.preconditions: The user has logged in and any Search Page is open

steps.action: In the Search Page field, enter data that is not contained in any post on the site
steps.expected_result: No results were found and the field is empty ![](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/29c6d5c9d2c497dcc239daadf92d37553143bf72/attachment/4ba320a6e15c8baa1bf808eb622ab422ea557507/%D0%97%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202022-08-24%20121831.jpg)
